casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Juan Manuel VILLA 328P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2017 Anita LeVeaux, Special Deputy Attorney General, Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Kathryn L. VandeBerg, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Villa, Juan Manuel.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of October 2017 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of October 2017."
